items.content_html: Netly-rn-expo is a lightweight React Native package for displaying a network status toast that notifies users about their internet connection status in real time. It supports detecting when the network is lost, restored, or becomes slow.

items.content_html: Zeno is a zero-dependency, lightweight web framework for TypeScript, designed for maximum simplicity and flexibility. It provides intuitive file-based routing and makes building APIs and web applications straightforward while ensuring high performance.

items.content_html: A simple link aggregation tool built with React, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Inspired by Linktree, it helps organize and share links on a single, customizable page. Lightweight, responsive, and perfect for personal use.Input component can be used by anyone just by modifying the parameters.
items.title: himanshuverma8/hvcustomlinktree: A simple link aggregation tool built with React, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Inspired by Linktree, it helps organize and share links on a single, customizable page. Lightweight, responsive, and perfect for personal use.Input component can be used by anyone just by modifying the parameters.

items.content_html: NoteMark is a lightweight, mobile-first markdown note-taking app built with Next.js, React, and Zustand. It features real-time preview, autosave, and intuitive note management with customizable themes. Designed for desktop and mobile, NoteMark lets you effortlessly capture ideas and format notes.
items.title: FilipsMasolovs/note-mark: NoteMark is a lightweight, mobile-first markdown note-taking app built with Next.js, React, and Zustand. It features real-time preview, autosave, and intuitive note management with customizable themes. Designed for desktop and mobile, NoteMark lets you effortlessly capture ideas and format notes.

items.content_html: AxiomAI is a modern, lightweight AI chat application that provides instant access to advanced language models without requiring any sign-up or authentication. Experience seamless conversations with state-of-the-art AI models in a beautiful, responsive interface.
